update app_user
NICK_NAME = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ICON = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COUNTRY_CODE = #{countryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and IS_DELETED=false
